mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FREEWRITE(POST_ID, FREEWRITE_READ_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, MEMBER_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(#{id} #{freewriteReadCount}, #{replyCount}, #{memberId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT F.POST_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME, F.POST_READ_COUNT, F.REPLY_COUNT, F.USER_ID, F.CREATED_DATE, F.UPDATED_DATE, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_FREEWRITE F ON U.ID = F.USER_ID JOIN TBL_POST P ON F.POST_ID = P.ID WHERE F.POST_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY
F.POST_ID F.POST_READ_COUNT DESC ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRow} AND #{pagination.endRow}

SELECT f.POST_ID, f.POST_READ_COUNT, f.REPLY_COUNT, f.USER_ID, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, p.POST_TITLE, p.POST_CONTENT, u.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_FREEWRITE f JOIN TBL_POST p ON f.POST_ID = p.ID JOIN TBL_USER u ON f.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE f.POST_ID = #{id}
